DIO_EXCEPTION.CONNECTION_TIMEOUT: An error occurred due to a connection timeout.
DIO_EXCEPTION.SEND_TIMEOUT: An error occurred due to a send timeout.
DIO_EXCEPTION.RECEIVE_TIMEOUT: An error occurred due to a receive timeout.
DIO_EXCEPTION.BAD_CERTIFICATE: An error occurred due to an incorrect certificate.
DIO_EXCEPTION.BAD_RESPONSE: An error occurred due to an incorrect response status code.
DIO_EXCEPTION.CANCEL: An error occurred because the request was cancelled.
DIO_EXCEPTION.CONNECTION_ERROR: An error occurred due to a connection error.
DIO_EXCEPTION.UNKNOWN: An error occurred due to an unknown reason.

WEATHER_EXCEPTION.REGION_ERROR: An error occurred due to an unrecognized or invalid region being requested from the server.
WEATHER_EXCEPTION.LANGUAGE_ERROR: An error occurred because the server received data in a language it doesn't support or recognize.

UNKNOWN_EXCEPTION.NULL_RESPONSE_VALUE_ERROR: An error occurred because the server returned an empty or null response instead of the expected data.
UNKNOWN_EXCEPTION.UNKNOWN_EXCEPTION: An unspecified error occurred on the server that couldn't be categorized.

CLIENT_EXCEPTION.HTTP_CLIENT_ERROR: An error occurred while performing an HTTP request.
CLIENT_EXCEPTION.TRANSLATION_UPDATE_ERROR: An error occurred while updating the translations.
CLIENT_EXCEPTION.WEB_CERTIFICATE_COULD_NOT_BE_LOADED_ERRO: An error occurred while loading the web certificate.
CLIENT_EXCEPTION.ENUM_NOT_FOUND_ERROR: The enum value does not exist.
CLIENT_EXCEPTION.DATABASE_COULD_NOT_BE_OPENED_ERROR: An error occurred while opening the database.
CLIENT_EXCEPTION.DATABASE_COULD_NOT_BE_DELETED: An error occurred while deleting the database.
CLIENT_EXCEPTION.DATABASE_INSERT_ROW_OPERATION_ERROR: An error occurred during the database item insert operation.
CLIENT_EXCEPTION.DATABASE_UPDATE_ROW_OPERATION_ERROR: An error occurred during the database item update operation.
CLIENT_EXCEPTION.DATABASE_READ_ROW_OPERATION_ERROR: An error occurred during the database item read operation.
CLIENT_EXCEPTION.DATABASE_DELETE_ROW_OPERATION_ERROR: An error occurred during the database item delete operation.
CLIENT_EXCEPTION.DATABASE_USER_NOT_FOUND_ERROR: The user does not exist in the database.
CLIENT_EXCEPTION.FILE_READ_OPERATION_ERROR: An error occurred during the file read operation.
CLIENT_EXCEPTION.FILE_WRITE_OPERATION_ERROR: An error occurred during the file write operation.
CLIENT_EXCEPTION.FILE_UPDATE_OPERATION_ERROR: An error occurred during the file update operation.
CLIENT_EXCEPTION.FILE_DELETE_OPERATION_ERROR: An error occurred during the file delete operation.
CLIENT_EXCEPTION.FILE_OPEN_OPERATION_ERROR: An error occurred during the file open operation.
CLIENT_EXCEPTION.NO_APPLICATION_FOUND_TO_OPEN_THE_FILE_ER: There is no application found to open the file.
CLIENT_EXCEPTION.DEVICE_DIRECTORY_FETCH_SIZE_OPERATION_ER: An error occurred while reading the size of a file in the device.
CLIENT_EXCEPTION.DEVICE_DIRECTORY_CREATE_OPERATION_ERROR: An error occurred while creating a folder in the device.
CLIENT_EXCEPTION.DEVICE_DIRECTORY_DELETE_OPERATION_ERROR: An error occurred while deleting a folder in the device.
CLIENT_EXCEPTION.ENCRYPTION_ERROR: An error occurred during the encryption operation.
CLIENT_EXCEPTION.DECRYPTION_ERROR: An error occurred during the decryption operation.
CLIENT_EXCEPTION.HASH_ERROR: An error occurred during the hash operation.
CLIENT_EXCEPTION.PERMISSION_REQUIRED_ERROR: Permission is required for the operation.
CLIENT_EXCEPTION.PERMISSION_NOT_GIVEN_ERROR: Permission was not given for the operation.
CLIENT_EXCEPTION.SERIALIZATION_ERROR: An error occurred during the serialization operation.
CLIENT_EXCEPTION.DESERIALIZATION_ERROR: An error occurred during the deserialization operation.
CLIENT_EXCEPTION.NULL_POINTER_ERROR: An error occurred due to a null value.
CLIENT_EXCEPTION.STRING_OPERATION_ERROR: An error occurred during the string operation.
CLIENT_EXCEPTION.PARSE_OPERATION_ERROR: An error occurred during the parse operation.

APPLICATION_TEXT.DATABASE_INSERT_ROW_OPERATION_SUCCESS: The data has been added into the database successfully.
APPLICATION_TEXT.DATABASE_UPDATE_ROW_OPERATION_SUCCESS: The data has been updated in the database successfully.
APPLICATION_TEXT.DATABASE_DELETE_ROW_OPERATION_SUCCESS: The data has been deleted from the database successfully.
APPLICATION_TEXT.WEB_CERTIFICATE_IS_TRUSTED_SUCCESSFULLY: The web certificate is trusted successfully.
APPLICATION_TEXT.NOTIFICATION_PERMISSON_EXPLANATION: Allows the app to send notifications, so that you can receive notifications for incoming messages.
APPLICATION_TEXT.NOTIFICATION_ACCESS_PERMISSION_REQUEST_E: Permission is required for the app to send you notifications.
APPLICATION_TEXT.CAMERA_PERMISSON_EXPLANATION: Grants access to the camera application, allowing you to take photos and add them to message content or message attachments.
APPLICATION_TEXT.CAMERA_ACCESS_PERMISSION_REQUEST_EXPLANA: Permission is required to access the device's camera.
APPLICATION_TEXT.CALENDAR_PERMISSON_EXPLANATION: Grants access to the calendar application, allowing events to be saved and managed in the device's local calendar.
APPLICATION_TEXT.CALENDAR_ACCESS_PERMISSION_REQUEST_EXPLA: Permission is required to save and manage events in the device's local calendar.
APPLICATION_TEXT.STORAGE_PERMISSON_EXPLANATION: Grants access to the Downloads and Files folder, allowing you to save message attachments to your device.
APPLICATION_TEXT.STORAGE_ACCESS_PERMISSION_REQUEST_EXPLAN: Permission is required to access the Downloads and Files folder.
APPLICATION_TEXT.GALLERY_PERMISSON_EXPLANATION: Grants access to Photos and Gallery application, allowing you to select photos from the gallery and add them to message content or message attachments.
APPLICATION_TEXT.GALLERY_ACCESS_PERMISSION_REQUEST_EXPLAN: Permission is required to access the photo gallery.
